original: intros m z sx. unfold Iter_rem_aux. rewrite <- nd_card. unfold fmap_to_set. unfold card. rewrite <- nd_card. unfold card. induction (ndN m - card sx)%nat as [|n IHn]. - simpl. destruct (exds_dec sx z) as [H1|H2]. + simpl. auto. + simpl. auto. - simpl. destruct (exds_dec sx z) as [H1|H2]. + simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto. + simpl. auto.
